alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Portage; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 6:36PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WOOD...PORTAGE...SOUTHEASTERN MARATHON...SOUTHERN MARINETTE...MENOMINEE...WAUPACA...OCONTO AND SHAWANO COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM CDT... At 635 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mountain to near Bevent to 10 miles west of Babcock. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Stevens Point, Wisconsin Rapids, Marinette, Shawano, Waupaca, Clintonville, Oconto, Mosinee, Whiting, and Gillett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Marathon; Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Portage; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca; Wood
